channel.title: Hidden Files on TLDRBins
channel.description: Recent content in Hidden Files on TLDRBins

item.title: Alternate Data Stream
item.description: Show ADS Windows # cmd cmd /C dir /R <FILE_PATH> # powershell Get-Item -Path <FILE_PATH> -force -stream *

item.title: Find
item.description: Linux Locate a file locate <FILE> Find files of type file find . -type f Find and Open find / -name <FILE> -exec cat {} \; Find SUID bit set files find / -type f -user root \( -perm -4000 -o -perm -2000 \) 2>/dev/null -ls Find files owned by user find / -user <USER> -ls 2>/dev/null | grep -v -e " \/proc" -e " \/sys" Find files owned by group find / -group <GROUP> 2>/dev/null | grep -v -e ^/proc Find files created between 1/1/2024 and 31/12/2024 find / -type f -newermt 2024-01-01 !

item.title: Find (Windows)
item.description: Windows Show hidden files Get-ChildItem -force Find a file ls -path <PATH> -Filter <FILE> -recurse -erroraction silent where /R <PATH> <FILE> Find a file, with rules dir /s /b /a:-d-h <PATH> | findstr /i /v '<STRING>' +---------------------------------------+ |dir: | |/s : include subfolders | |/b : bare format | |/a:-d-h : exclude directories or hidden| | | |findstr: | |/i : case insensitive | |/v STRING : exclude STRING | +---------------------------------------+
